statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data;
SELECT arm_name, sensor_type, data_value FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_value FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT arm_name, sensor_type, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data GROUP BY arm_name, sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE arm_name = 'Arm A' LIMIT 10;
SELECT arm_name, sensor_type, timestamp, data_value FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value), MAX(data_value), MIN(data_value) FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE arm_name IN ('Arm B', 'Arm C') ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT arm_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data GROUP BY arm_name HAVING total_records > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT arm_id, sensor_reading FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE sensor_reading > 100;
SELECT id, arm_id, timestamp, sensor_reading FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE arm_id = 3;
SELECT timestamp, sensor_reading FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE sensor_reading < 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT arm_id, MAX(sensor_reading) FROM robotic_arms_data GROUP BY arm_id;
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE arm_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT arm_id, AVG(sensor_reading) AS avg_reading, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM robotic_arms_data GROUP BY arm_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT arm_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM arm_metrics WHERE speed > 50 GROUP BY arm_id ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT arm_id, position, speed FROM arm_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY arm_id, timestamp;

SELECT rd.arm_id, am.position, rd.sensor_reading FROM robotic_arms_data rd JOIN arm_metrics am ON rd.arm_id = am.arm_id WHERE rd.sensor_reading > 100 AND am.speed < 30 ORDER BY rd.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT id, arm_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT arm_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY arm_id;
SELECT rd.id, ra.name AS arm_name, rs.status FROM SensorData rd INNER JOIN RoboticArms ra ON rd.arm_id = ra.id INNER JOIN ArmStatus rs ON rd.arm_id = rs.arm_id;
SELECT * FROM RoboticArms WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT arm_id, AVG(value) FROM SensorData GROUP BY arm_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50
SELECT name, manufacturer, location FROM RoboticArms WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM ArmStatus WHERE status = 'Active' AND last_update > '2022-01-01'
SELECT SensorData.id, SensorData.timestamp, ArmStatus.status FROM SensorData JOIN ArmStatus ON SensorData.arm_id = ArmStatus.arm_id
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_data;
SELECT arm_id, position_x, position_y FROM robotic_arms_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT movement_type, COUNT(*) FROM arm_movement GROUP BY movement_type;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM arm_errors WHERE arm_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(success_rate) FROM arm_statistics WHERE arm_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM robotic_arms_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT arm_id, position_x, position_y FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE arm_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT movement_id, arm_id, movement_type FROM arm_movement WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY movement_id;
SELECT arm_id, COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM arm_errors GROUP BY arm_id HAVING total_errors > 5;
SELECT arm_id, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM arm_statistics GROUP BY arm_id HAVING avg_success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT arm_name, arm_status FROM Arms ORDER BY arm_name ASC
SELECT robot_name FROM Robot WHERE robot_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Arms WHERE arm_type = 'Industrial'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Arms INNER JOIN Arm_Sensors ON Arms.arm_id = Arm_Sensors.arm_id
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, arm_id, arm_name FROM Robot_Arms INNER JOIN Arms ON Robot_Arms.arm_id = Arms.arm_id
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(arm_id) AS arm_count FROM Robot_Arms GROUP BY robot_id HAVING arm_count > 1
SELECT robot_name, arm_name, arm_type, arm_status FROM Robot_Arms INNER JOIN Arms ON Robot_Arms.arm_id = Arms.arm_id INNER JOIN Robot ON Robot_Arms.robot_id = Robot.robot_id
